ere are the extracted triplets:

<Text: La Ville dont le prince est un enfant
1:
--------------------
Text: La Ville dont le prince est un enfant (play):  The title, literally translated, "The City Whose Prince is a Child", is taken from Ecclesiastes 10:16: ""Woe to thee, O land, when thy king is a child, and thy princes eat in the morning!"
Triplets:<La Ville dont le prince est un enfant
